      • addMessages

        public co.nectar.HtmlResponce.HtmlResponce addMessages(java.lang.Integer toId,
                                                       java.lang.Integer fromId,
                                                       Message msg)
        Add message between toId and fromId. creates new conversation if does not exist
        Parameters:
        toId - user to send message to
        fromId - user to send message from
        msg - message to send
        Returns:
        HtmlReponse denoting success

        Parameters:

        fromId - user messages sent from
        Returns:

      • deleteConversation

        public co.nectar.HtmlResponce.HtmlResponce deleteConversation(java.lang.Integer toId,
                                                              java.lang.Integer fromId)
        Deletes conversation between two users. Note: only deletes one users conversation.
        Parameters:
        toId - user deleting messages
        fromId - user which toId wishes to delete messages from
        Returns:
        HtmlReponse denoting success
